article_title: A Chat With Dr. Farzad Mostashari

article_metadata.description: Most of those who know Dr. Farzad Mostashari have come to know him as the passionate patient advocate with the colorful bowties. In fact, his signature sartorial accessory even has its own twitter handle: Farzad’s Bowtie (319 followers). The flair is fitting – but the role and challenge as the National Coordinator [...]
article_metadata.author: Dan Munro
